title: 1984 When Two Worlds Collide
description: This fast action, spine-tingling, horror story will keep your hair standing on end until the last page. It's the summer of 1984, the sun is shining, and kids are enjoying their summer vacation in the small town of Boise, Idaho. All of them except teenager Lance Bergman.For Lance, his nightmare continues. He escaped the cruel alternate world of Sheol, where he battled Charlie, a sadistic demonic serial killer and his army of grouplings. Now Lance must return to save the world and his friend Ryan. Follow the teenagers and a faithful dog as they journey back into the unholy world of Sheol to save Ryan. Along the way, they will have to fight hoards of evil undead, dark specters, and vultures the size of a bus as they navigate the surreal landscape for an epic final battle with Charlie. It's winner take all. The fate of the world relies on a group of frightened teenagers. Can they save the world and their friend?
author: Jerome Sitko
